othermeta.content: An audit trail is created for many agreements and programs; user actions, timestamps and modified dates are captured and displayed in the Activities tab.

othermeta.name: usecase
othermeta.content: record and display audit activity for agreements and programs

body.p: An audit trail is created for many agreements and program activities. Context, object name, description, original value, new value, modified by, and modified date are captured and displayed in the Activities tab. All activities are displayed in the latest version of the agreement. You can view original creation through the latest amendments in the most current version, applicable to the agreement.
By default, agreement tracking is minimal but can be configured to extend to actions and edits to attributes via business rules provided by the platform EUF Utility.
Activities Tracked automatically for Agreements are:
Basic program updates are captured when the agreement is activated and when programs are amended. Following is a list of activities captured for programs:

ul.li: Program is activated (when the associated agreement is activated)

Updates captured for program header fields include:
Program Name
Account Type
Can be Combined?
Create Bundle?
Billing Rule
Program Schedule Day
Grace Period
Payment Term
Payment Method
Invoice Delivery Method
Invoice Output Format
Invoice Email Template
Program Setting

Updates captured for Qualification and Benefits include
Benefit Product is changed
Benefit Amount is changed
Benefit Product end date is updated
Qualification Product is changed
Qualification Amount is changed
Qualification Product end date is updated
New Benefit Product is added to the program
Includes values for a new start and end date, and price, quantity, or tiers
New Qualification and Benefit Product is added to the program
Includes values for a new start and end date, and price, quantity, or tiers

Updates captured for Participants include
Participant end date is updated
Participant is deleted
Participant is added

body.p: Activity tracking includes the action (activation, amendment, update), the original value and new value along with context, object, modified by, and modified date.
